title: (Don't Fear) The Reaper
summary: "(Don't Fear) The Reaper" is a song by American rock band Blue Ã–yster Cult from the band's 1976 album Agents of Fortune. The song, written and sung by lead guitarist Donald "Buck Dharma" Roeser, deals with eternal love and the inevitability of death. Dharma wrote the song while picturing an early death for himself.
